messages.message:
I tried to test the new ib_llm_tools 0.0.8 with the EU Azure API and it seems like the mapping from OpenAI Model version to Azure Model version may not be correct?

Error message: `Error - Exception calling function - call_model_converse: Exception Azure deployment corresponding to model: gpt-3.5-turbo-0301 is not present in AZURE_MODEL_DEPLOYMENT_MAP.. Defined in ib/market/ib_llm_tools/ai_hub.py (line 239)`
There is a configuration patch that is missing it seems

The default value of `AZURE_MODEL_DEPLOYMENT_MAP` is `{\"text-davinci-003\":\"text-davinci-003\", \"gpt-3.5-turbo\": \"gpt-35-turbo\"}`

I am not sure which env you’re using but you’ll need to update the above map with `gpt-3.5-turbo-0301` and add it to the model-service config via a Deployment Manager patch.
Thanks! I will try that in the morning!
Seems like this is something that we should update more broadly otherwise we will have more deployements and potentially SaaS customer environments run into this cc: @jtau @jayapandian.ponraj
